channel.title: Projects on Alejandro Coria Games
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Alejandro Coria Games

item.title: Colorful Ball
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: Colorful Ball is a puzzle that requires ingenuity and skill. You control a ball that can change color. You need the correct color to be able to go through the correct walls and get to the next checkpoint. You will find turrets that will shoot at different times and that you will have to go over to get their color. You will also get different skills that will be useful to solve the challenges.

item.title: Map​Frontiers
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: This mod is an addon for Journey Map that allows you to divide the map into regions and assign them names, colors and a banner. Need Journey Map 1.12.2-5.7.0 or 1.16.5-5.7.3.

item.title: Auto​Preset​Map
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: This mod is an addon for Journey Map that changes the minimap preset when you change dimension. It is for the client (Forge or Fabric), it is not needed on the server. To configure it, use the button to the right on the JourneyMap fullscreen map.

item.title: P-Changer
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: You need to activate adobe flash player to play this game.
